desc: Students who have already completed a unit in creative writing or produced manuscripts in some other context have the opportunity to deepen and polish their work and to develop and complete individual projects in fiction and poetry. Class sessions are devoted to the discussion of the craft, the examination of literary models and workshopping of student writing. Emphasis for each section is announced the previous spring. Prerequisite: English 251, 255, 257 or writing equivalent.
name: Adv Fict Wrtg Wkshp
title: Creative Writing II: Poetry and Fiction
